name: File Cleaner, Junk Clean - Free up Storage Space
description: No more storage space for new videos? No more storage space for new Apps ? Want to know which App takes up the most storage space? You just need Better File Cleaner.   With Better File Cleaner, you can easily find all the Big Files on your phone, you can free up storage space by deleting cache and junk files, and manage all the files easily. With Better File Cleaner, You can easily find out which apps are taking up the most storage space.  Features:  Clean all kinds of junk files, such as Log Files, Cache Files, Temporary Files, Installed APK Files, Unnecessary Big Files, Empty Files and Folders, etc.  Large Files: Quickly find out all the Big files/Large files on your phone. Support sort by size/date/name.  File Explorer: Help you manage all the files on your device.  Support to create/edit TXT files.  App Manager: Sort apps by storage size, so you can quickly find apps that take up more storage space.   Explanation of Permissions: Read or Write External Storage - The permission is required to read the files in the SD Card and the app cant work without it.
